name: Mrs. Suchitra Pillai
description: Suchitra Pillai graduated from Fr. CRCE👨‍🎓 in 1991 with a degree in Electronics Engineering. As soon as she graduated she moved to England, auditioned and bagged the lead role in a French movie. Later on she continued her journey as an Independent Entertainment Professional while simultaneously juggling many roles which include VJ, RJ ,Dubbing Artist, Singer, Mother, Compere, etc.

name: Mr. Kartavya Chitalia
description: Mr. Kartavya Chitalia completed his Bachelor's 👨‍🎓 in Electronics Engineering,💡from CRCE 🏨 in the year 1993. When there were no more jobs in the electronics sector, he broke out in the IT sector. Following this decision he spent 8 Years in the Silicon Valley, US. Upon returning to the homeland he founded his own Venture 'ATIDAN' that specializes in cloud computing, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, business intelligence, and staffing solutions. Today, Atidan is a successful Venture with its offices and consultants in 14 different countries.

name: Mr. Uday Kamath
description: Mr. Uday Kamath completed his Bachelor's 👨‍🎓 in Electronics Engineering,💡from CRCE 🏨 in the year 1996. He then went on to continue his Master's in Computer Science 🖥️ from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte. In the year 2013, he  acquired a PhD 🎓 in Computer from George Mason University, Virginia. He is currently working 💼 as Chief Analytics Officer 👨‍💻at Smarsh.  He is highly experienced in building large analytic teams, machine learning, statistical learning and graph modelling and fraud detection. He is also a bioinformatics expert in sequence and structure prediction for DNA, protein, AMP etc. He is truly an inspiration to everyone who wishes to pursue a career in Computer Science.

name: Mrs. Sonal Nangia
description: Mrs. Sonal Nangia started her professional journey with Wipro as a Sr. Executive and then later he founded her own venture “RED ENGINE” whose sole mission is to “Connect People To Their Power” 🎭. Red Engine specializes in corporate trainings, soft skills and many more. This women's days let's learn from an experience of a Women Entrepreneur who has created a well deserved position for herself, whose Journey might be inspirational to many of us!. “A women with voice is by definition a strong women. But, the search to find can be remarkably difficult but not impossible!” Happy Women's Day to all the fabulous women out there!❤️❤️

name: Mr. Pavan Savant
description: Mr. Pavan Savant is a 1994 Graduate of CRCE 👨🏻‍🎓in the department of Production Engineering. 👨‍🏭He completed his master's in Management Studies from NMIMS. 🏫He is an analytical and passionate professional with 20 + years of experience in blue chip companies like Tata, Reliance and Mahindra Groups. In the year 2016, he made a conscious decision to move to the Academic and Social Development sector. Now, his goal is to share his knowledge and add value based on his experience and learning.

name: Ms. Shivani Vartak
description: Ms. Shivani Vartak is a 2018 CRCE graduate👩‍🎓 from the Department of Production Engineering. She went on to continue her masters in Mechanical Engineering from Columbia University, a recognized Ivy League school. She is currently working as a Mechanical Engineer👩‍🔧 at Schlumberger. She is truly an inspiration to all the girls aspiring to pursue the core subjects and engineering as a whole.

name: Mrs. Rashmi Nath
description: Mrs. Rashmi Nath Completed her Bachelors Degree in Electronics Engineering in 1995 👩🏻‍🎓. She also did her Masters in Computer Science from Oregon State University, US🏫. Currently Working as a Technical Director- Sales📊, Capabilities at INTEL CORP from past 13 Years!. She is also a Mentor at PDX Women in Tech

name: Mr. Deepal Dass
description: Currently working as VFX Team Lead and Supervisor in YFX Studios pvt. ltd. Mr. Deepal Dass has completed his Bachelors in Electronics Engineering in 2002. He has handled creative deliveries as a Team Lead for 50+ TV commercials and 75 + Feature Film projects which include blockbusters like Dhoom 3, Ek tha Tiger, Bhaag Milkha Bhaag to name a few.

name: Mr. Sanket Jack
description: Our Alum of the batch 2009, Mr. Sanket Jack, Information Technology Engineer, Co-founder of India's 1st Cricket Fantasy gaming platform, PMP Certified Management Professional, Renowned Professional Cartoonist and the Current VP for Technology and Projects of Ka Enterprises. Engineer by Degree, Manager by Profession and Cartoonist by Passion

name: Mr. Nirmal Topiwala
description: Mr. Nirmal Topiwala, our Alum of the batch 2012, Electronics Engineering; is the Cofounder, at Ajackus. He previously cofounded Visa Guide. He is a serial Entrepreneur,Angel investor and avid traveller.

name: Mr. Paresh Shetty
description: Mr. Paresh, is an Alumnus of the batch 1993, Electronics Engineering. He is currently the President, Sales at Cloud4C Services. He was previously working for Vodafone Idea Limited and led their Enterprise business. He is a highly involved alum, frequent public speaker, and avid cricket enthusiast.
